channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- OpenShift Serverless
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- OpenShift Serverless

item.title: CVE-2023-3089|2024-08-02T06:41:04.166Z -- red%20hat -- openshift%20serverless
item.description: A compliance problem was found in the Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform. Red Hat discovered that, when FIPS mode was enabled, not all of the cryptographic modules in use were FIPS-validated.

item.title: CVE-2024-3653|2024-07-08T21:21:20.899Z -- red%20hat -- openshift%20serverless
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Undertow. This issue requires enabling the learning-push handler in the server's config, which is disabled by default, leaving the maxAge config in the handler unconfigured. The default is -1, which makes the handler vulnerable. If someone overwrites that config, the server is not subject to the attack. The attacker needs to be able to reach the server with a normal HTTP request.
